camelcase-keys

Convert object keys to camelCase using camelcase

Install

$ npm install --save camelcase-keys

Usage

```js const camelcaseKeys = require(‘camelcase-keys’);

camelcaseKeys({‘foo-bar’: true}); //=> {fooBar: true}

const argv = require(‘minimist’)(process.argv.slice(2)); //=> {_: [], ‘foo-bar’: true}

camelcaseKeys(argv); //=> {_: [], fooBar: true} ```

API

camelcaseKeys(input, [options])

input

Type: object

Object to camelCase.

options

Type: object

exclude

Type: array
Default: []

Exclude keys from being camelCased.
